ygData.subject: Re: A ray of Hope
ygData.msgSnippet: Bloodblade passes through the asteroid belt after the Ray, far enough to be undiscovered. He engages his cloaking devices and electronic suppressor so that he

Bloodblade passes through the asteroid belt after the Ray, far enough 
to be undiscovered. He engages his cloaking devices and electronic 
suppressor so that he can travel in absolute discreteness, then 
engages his warp drives. He travels so fast that only an hour later, 
he gets in Earth's orbit. There, he activates his holo-camouflage and 
disguises as a pod. He waits.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Ray Of Hope: The ship that detached itself from the base Is now in 
a race against time to get to the Maximal base. It is traveling at 
supersonic speeds. It's Est time is 12 hrs. It begins to send out an 
Emergency beacon.
> 
> Proudwing500k@h... wrote:Unicron was perplexed by the attack, puny 
as it was. He called one of 
> his many Minions.
> 
> Unicron: Bloodblade, come forth.
> 
> His deep, booming voice transmitted his intentions telepathically 
to 
> the army standing before him.
> 
> Bloodblade: My lord, how can I serve you?
> 
> Unicron: I suspect that this attack was a warning. I fear that they 
> might bring unwanted reinforcements against Rockseeker and 
Lunekill. 
> I want you to disguise yourself and to infiltrate them. Whatever 
> happens, find out why they come, and destroy them once you have 
found 
> out.
> 
> Bloodblade: I will do as you wish, Master. No one will even 
remember 
> who they were.
> 
> Thus, Bloodblade transformed into a crimson colored starfighter and 
> flew to earth, planning how he would infiltrate the attackers.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > The Ray of Hope:
> >    Is moving towards a Jupiter takeing the blows of tthe little 
> armada of ships. It soon hides inside Jupiters Shadow to use it as 
a 
> Diversion. Then sets its engine to full power and plots a cokurse 
for 
> eath at litght speed. When it gets into orbit of eath it releases a 
> ship to travel to the planet. The remainder of it Changes into a 
base 
> like structure and makes it's decent to the planets surface. Hiding 
> itself on the planet.
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Quite a hopeless situation but you can try.
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Unicron's Minion do not even need an order; they know they are 
made 
> > to protect their master at any cost...
> > 
> > While some of them perish in the concentrated fire, the remaining 
> > thousands quickly enter the fray and move in a dispersive 
maneuver. 
> > This leaves Unicron relatively open to attacks, but the 
pretentious 
> > ones would not even damage the Huge Robot.
> > 
> > The Minions return fire on the ship and many of them prepare even 
> > more devastating batteries of energy. If no one ever knew why 
> Unicron 
> > ate whole planets, the Ray of Hope would soon know...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> 
wrote:
> > > The Ray stops just outside the Solarsystem out of Unicrons 
Reach. 
> > It appears to be a ship of some sort. About the same size of 
> Unicron. 
> > The ship seems to have a Life source on it. The signal of the 
> > frequency seems to be that of a Transformer. the ship then moves 
> > slowly into Range and starts it's attack on unicron. sending out 
a 
> > pulse beam targeting Unicrons fleet of ships.
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Unicron felt the incoming ray, 
and 
> > he did not want to take any 
> > > chances. Within moments, a massive army of Minions were 
orbiting 
> > > around him, ready to open fire on whatever that was. Lunekill 
and 
> > > Rockseeker had better give results soon...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > A Light beam seems to be traveling fast from somewhere in 
> > > deepspace. The Trajectory seems to be towards Unicron this ray 
> > seems 
> > > to be of a frequency Not know  in any Database of any world 
that 
> > > Unicron has ever Seen. It is closing Fast on him.
> > > > 
> > > >
